body: even that comic at the end doesn't make any fucking sense, but as close as I can figure out from the Japanese text this person is trying to get us to buy the comic ourselves to support the artist, which is what "scan it yourself" might actually mean, and not some retarded Randian power fantasy where you're the only one who's a hardass grownup enough to show how nobody owes anything to anybody ever, cuz you're too autistic to actually understand a point your dad once made about hard work
